data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Lovech to exponentially multiply disciples.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Lovech, Bulgaria
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Lovech.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Lovech to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Lovech.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Adyghe people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
There are 122,500 people living in the state of Lovech. Only about 2,427 might be believers.
Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Lovech to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.section_summary:
the state of Lovech, Bulgaria has a population of 122,500.

We estimate Lovech has 2,427 people who might know Jesus, 98,483 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 21,590 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 50 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Lovech, Bulgaria.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,
